title: Very good
review:
Thanks Flipkart ....
I am writing this review after 1 month of usage 
No heating issue and working very smoothly...
Built quality is really very good...
And battery backup is ok...
Only the problem is with sound quality which is very poor in Moto mobiles....
Overall it's a good phone in this price range

title: One Star
review: Initially I was worried as the order was shown as delivered when I have not received the item. But the problem was resolved soon and received the item a day after I complained. the phone so far works well as expected and as described, good form and reasonably good features for the price. actually better than most costlier smartphones. My only concern is( and also a big scare) my account showed delivered when actually it wasn't delivered yet. which I guess is the fault of the local courier. Thank you Flipkart for resolving the problem soon.

title: Not recommended at all
review:
Even though the price is 9k but the quality of the phone is 5k type.
My phone by chance dropped from height of 1.2 feet and bang! The screen broke in an instant.
Previously i had a moto e
That also got broken in just one drop from a very less height.
Moto screens are very delicate.
After buying it plzz immediately use a tempered glass or flip cover..

title: Horrible
review:
Worst phone ever from Moto. At home we used  to be a fan of moto. We bought 2 Moto G1, a G4Plus and now this. We were happy with 1st 2 version. But this one sucks. Finger print sensor stops, apps crashing and so on. It's almost 4-5 months using it. But was my biggest mistake buying it. 

Won't recommend purchase

title: Problem with back cover.
review: Very good performance and battery backup. But when i took out the phone from box i saw a gap on top of phone. The back cover doesn't lock well. Otherwise the phone is best under 10k . I am doing a replacement

title: Worth the money
review:
Flipkart delivered the handset on time.
The phone works great.
Decent camera at such a price.
No lag and a great performer when it comes to browsing.
Heating may occur for prolonged gaming.
Battery life is not that great but still good at such a decent price.
Would recommend to those who do lot surfing and less gaming.

title: Most worthless product
review:
I loved Moto mobile, before bought this mobile. 3 months before I have bought this product from Flipkart, everything was good like
1. Camera
2. Touch
3. Comfort
4. User friendly
But after using this product, I observed many problems on this device, main is Heating problem- When I used to take a video call from Google duo, within 10 mins the device convert into a heater. Then camera- Very bad quality of camera on this product that is not expected from moto. Then Hanging problem- It is built with Snapdragon processor but it works very slowly, many times it hangs and take switch off automatically. Then last few days I have observed a new problem, mostly I didn't see this type of problem in any other device. The problem is if you want to install a particular apps from play store it downloads easily but when you uninstall this particular apps it will uninstall but there have been created a bad effect of this particular apps and make the device very slow. 

My recommendation is don't even buy any Motorola mobile, it is the worthless mobile device rather than others. If you want to buy that's your choice but I strongly recommend that go to other mobile brands.

title: Just okay
review:
pros
Good Looking Design
fingerprint sensor
3 gb ram
16gb storage
full hd display
qualcomm 430 octa core
front camera average good
descent battery backup
dual sim both sim 3g active at time
dedicated memory slot

cons
normal good display
color production normal compare to amoled
slightly low volume compare to j2
average camera
android UI no Customized UI like vivo, oppo, Samsung
low battery capacity
 2g network quality average compare to mediatek soc in low coverage area
